data.message: Will not use your messanger app, invasion of privacy.  Also I do not like you limiting my pages seen. I can't like or comment if they are not posting to my page!

replies.message: Hey Susan. We know there's been a lot of false and scary information circulating about Messenger permissions, and we want to help clarify how we actually use these permissions in the app. Read more: http://on.fb.me/1E0Ng02. -Sarah
I'll try to POST the above, but fully expect it to be deleted or augmented.
Susan, you will probably never view any of this, but I don't reside in Mayberry Andy,Opie,Barney may.. .or live at Disney World.
